import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";// Soft UI Dashboard PRO React Helper Functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var transparent=colors.transparent,info=colors.info,secondary=colors.secondary,grey=colors.grey;var size=typography.size;export default{base:{backgroundColor:transparent.main,height:"max-content",color:info.main,boxShadow:"none",padding:"".concat(pxToRem(6)," ").concat(pxToRem(12)),"&:hover":{backgroundColor:transparent.main,boxShadow:"none",color:info.focus},"&:focus":{boxShadow:"none",color:info.focus},"&:active, &:active:focus, &:active:hover":{opacity:0.85,boxShadow:"none"},"&:disabled":{color:grey[600],boxShadow:"none"},"& .material-icons, .material-icons-round, svg, span":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(16)," !important")}},small:{fontSize:size.xs,"& .material-icons, .material-icons-round, svg, span":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(12)," !important")}},large:{fontSize:size.sm,"& .material-icons, .material-icons-round, svg, span":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(22)," !important")}},primary:{color:info.main,backgroundColor:transparent.main,"&:hover":{color:info.focus,backgroundColor:transparent.main},"&:focus:not(:hover)":{color:info.focus,backgroundColor:transparent.focus,boxShadow:"none"}},secondary:{color:secondary.focus,backgroundColor:transparent.main,"&:hover":{color:secondary.focus,backgroundColor:transparent.main},"&:focus:not(:hover)":{color:secondary.focus,backgroundColor:transparent.focus,boxShadow:"none"}}};
